topic.title: CSS Styling to Customize WebHelp Output

keywords.indexterm: WebHelp Classic systemCSS styling to customize WebHelp output
WebHelp Responsive systemCSS styling to customize WebHelp output

body.p: One way to customize WebHelp output is to use custom CSS styling. This method can be used to make small, simple styling changes or more advanced, precise changes. To implement the styling in your WebHelp output, you simply need to create the custom CSS file and reference it in your transformation scenario.
